data.name: RPGScenery - Norse Village Scene
data.detailed_description:
At the end of the fjord between the mountains lies a small settlement, inhabited by brave warriors and sailors who do not shy away from the cold winds that dominate the area. The village consists of a few dozen houses; the highest point is the town hall, the deepest is the port. Between these two are the market, the gun shop, and most of the dwellings.

This DLC contains 6 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
